summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Files, Notes, and Collaborators modules (Phase 4). All three modules are fully functional with proper backend integration, role-based access controls, and intuitive UI. Backend APIs working perfectly with 64/64 tests passing. Frontend integration successful with all tabs, buttons, and dialogs working correctly.
passed_tests: GET /api/projects/:id/files returns files array
POST /api/projects/:id/files uploads file with proper metadata
DELETE /api/projects/:id/files/:file_id deletes file (Admin only)
File upload permission control working (Admin/Manager/Designer can upload)
File deletion permission control working (Admin only)
GET /api/projects/:id/notes returns notes array
POST /api/projects/:id/notes creates note with creator info
PUT /api/projects/:id/notes/:note_id updates note with auto-save
Note edit permission control working (creator or Admin only)
GET /api/projects/:id/collaborators returns collaborators with user details
POST /api/projects/:id/collaborators adds collaborator (Admin/Manager only)
DELETE /api/projects/:id/collaborators/:user_id removes collaborator (Admin only)
GET /api/users/available returns user list (Admin/Manager only)
Collaborator add permission control working (Admin/Manager only)
Collaborator remove permission control working (Admin only)
Files tab displays empty state correctly
Files tab shows Upload File button for authorized users
Files tab upload functionality working
Notes tab displays empty state correctly
Notes tab Create Note button working
Notes tab notepad-style editor with auto-save working
Note title and content editing working
Note creation and editing UI working perfectly
Collaborators tab lists team members with avatars and roles
Collaborators tab Add Collaborator button opens dialog
Add Collaborator dialog shows user search functionality
User search in collaborator dialog working
Collaborator dialog displays available users with roles
Tab navigation between Files, Notes, Collaborators working
Project details page navigation working
All backend endpoints returning correct data structures
Role-based access control working for all endpoints
Frontend-backend integration working seamlessly
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (64/64 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all Files, Notes, Collaborators features working correctly)
